TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FillBehavior extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how a behaves when it is outside its active period but its parent is inside its active or hold period.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior HoldEnd = int32(0)

Docs.summary: After it reaches the end of its active period, the timeline holds its progress until the end of its parent's active and hold periods.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior Stop = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The timeline stops if it is outside its active period while its parent is inside its active period.
